DesignWork.title: "Colecta 2022" with Coaniquem
description: Development of the graphic production for Coaniquem's "Colecta 2022" campaign.

Coaniquem is a private non-profit institution, whose main objectives are to rehabilitate children and teenagers with burns and other scars free of charge, being "Colecta" the most important source of income for its financing.

DesignWork.title: Un Hombre de Verdad - Fanzines
description: Fanzine that compiles the testimonies of 246 Chilean men who consider themselves affected by the hegemonic model of masculinity.
For this project, the research work, the conceptual illustrations, and the binding of the fanzine in multiple formats were carried out.

DesignWork.title: Coaniquem BCF
description: Graphic and informational content design for Coaniquem BCF's social networks.
Coaniquem BCF is a non-profit organization in the United States. Its mission is to support the work of Coaniquem based in Chile, with special emphasis on international programs.

DesignWork.title: 50th Anniversary of the Ilko Toaster
description: Advertising campaign to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the Ilko toaster. The campaign included the development of a limited version of toasters and an advertising video, with the purpose of rescuing the value that has as a national product.

DesignWork.title: Paperman Short Film, Alternative Covers
description: Fictitious and alternative posters for the Disney Pixar Paperman short film. The development of this project resulted in two illustrated posters.
This project was not commissioned by the creators of the short film, nor is it directly related to it.

cta.title: Watch the original Walt Disney Short Film

DesignWork.title: GRIK - logo and infographic
description: Logo design, brand identity and explanatory infographics for the GRIK project (2018). The font of the logo was designed from scratch for this particular project.

DesignWork.title: Minecraft Nether Update infographic
description: Infographic that in an easy, fast and entertaining way, shows the features and changes integrated to the new update of the Minecraft video game.
This project was not commissioned by the developers of the video game, nor is it directly related to it.

cta.title: Watch the original Nether Update trailer

DesignWork.title: Tecnogruas
description: Business cards, brochure and silicone bracelets for "Tecnogruas" for ExpoMin 2023.

DesignWork.title: Ciudad de Dios, cinematographic imaginaries
description: This project represents the collective imaginary of the Brazilian favela in the movie Ciudad de Dios, which shows an approach to the criminal world in Rio de Janeiro.
Based on an analysis of the film, elements that build the identity of the favela and illustrate the vulnerability of its reality were used for the project.

DesignWork.title: RCP19 - Low cost harvesting machine project
description: RCP-19 is a horizontal trailed potato harvester. Its function is to replace the act of bending down and replace part of the force required during work in order to increase productivity and at the same time reduce work-related injuries. The tool is designed to be intuitive, simple to use and easy to operate.

This project was carried out and presented to the Foundation for Agricultural Innovation (FIA) in Chile during 2019. It was then patented and published in the innovation column of the newspaper El Mercurio.

DesignWork.title: "YoPongoLaCara" COVID-19 Project
description: In charge of the communications campaign for the collaborative project between the REBLUM Foundation, Decathlon and the Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile "YoPongoLaCara" (2020).

The project revolves around the creation of the "FullFace" Protective Mask, an adaptation of the Decathlon diving mask in response to the demand for personal protective equipment (PPE) for healthcare workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. More than 600 physical masks were distributed in 2020.
Led, designed, and implemented a training video, an informative graphic with guidance on the use of the mask, and social media content.

DesignWork.title: Organ Donation data visualization
description: Easy-to-read infographic on multiple aspects of organ donation in Chile. Through the use of five transparent and individual micas, detailed information is presented on the most relevant organs for each topic.

DesignWork.title: Triada social media content
description: Managed, designed and implemented a brand identity design for the social networks of the meditation center "Triada". Based in Santiago, Chile, Triada aspired to become a global facilitator of distance meditation tools.
The development of this project resulted in several audiovisual creations and social media content design.

DesignWork.title: Virutex Products Sketches
description: Product sketches.
The development of these drawings was only one stage of the complete project with the brand.

DesignWork.title: Cover design
description: This cover was created as a freelance work for "Ril Editores" editorial. It combines visual elements and typography, achieving the incorporation of initials from philosopher Richard Rorty as the main design.

DesignWork.title: Medical School, Finis Terrae - Covers
description: Design of a collection of workshop front and back covers.

DesignWork.title: BCF x AmazonSmile - social media content
description: Design of social media content and explanatory videos of the collaboration between Coaniquem BCF and Amazon Smile, with the purpose of encouraging the use of the platform and explaining the donation process.
Amazon is one of the largest U.S. companies as a global leader in e-commerce. During 2013, Amazon implemented Amazon Smile, a service that donates 0.5% of purchase to charities such as Coaniquem BCF.

DesignWork.title: Triada - brochure
description: Information brochure for the meditation center "Triada".
This project was done during the internship at Piano&Piano design studio.
